objects.specification: The floor is a sleek rectangular panel with a smooth asphalt-like gray surface simulating a showroom base, edged with subtle trim and finished to a high-quality, non-reflective sheen.
A smooth flat panel colored in a neutral soft gray tone, 3 meters high and 0.2 meters thick, with a professional matte finish and crisp edges.
A smooth flat panel colored in a neutral soft gray tone, 3 meters high and 0.2 meters thick, with a professional matte finish and crisp edges.

A highly detailed modern demo car with realistic bodywork and a glossy brand-color finish, fully modeled wheels, tinted windows with visible interior seats and dashboard, reflective chrome accents and low-profile tires.
A large vertical display stand with clean lines, finished in a vibrant brand red, featuring a sturdy rectangular base and a flat front panel for mounting informational boards.

A tall hanging banner made of lightweight fabric, printed with vibrant car-brand graphics on both sides, top-mounted to the ceiling with discreet fixtures.

A sleek ceiling-mounted adjustable spotlight with a conical housing, matte black finish and a bright LED source designed to cast a focused beam directly downward.

A modern reception desk with a clean minimalist design, smooth neutral-tone surface, integrated branding accent on the front panel, and hidden storage compartments underneath.
A modern staff chair with ergonomic backrest, padded seat in dark neutral upholstery and slender metal legs.
A small round table with a sturdy central pedestal and a smooth matte surface suitable for visitor seating.
